issue.title: [C++] csv reader skip_row does not properly update num_rows_seen
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When skip_rows is specified the num_rows_seen is set to the number of rows skipped which does not work when row numbers are 1 based
